title: GISData
description: Smart Data Models - A Data Model Geographic Information System data.

description.description: Property. Description for an IUDX thing.

dataDescriptor.description: Relationship. URI pointing to the data-descriptor entity

gisAccessToken.description: Property. A string of encrypted information that contains the user's name, the token expiration time, and some proprietary information, which is used to access the secured GIS services from the GIS Server.

gisServerURL.description: Property. The Geographic Information System (GIS) Server's URL, used for capturing, storing, and displaying data on positions on the earth's surface.

gisLayers.description: Property. The GIS data layers stored in the GIS Server corresponding to this observation.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Last reported time of observation.
